participant_1.background:
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.
I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice.
I do not have kids, but I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
I like to read pet training blogs and websites.
i have a ten year old son.

i think i have talent for it.

content.text: Hi! I am going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams. What are your plans for today?
I just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education and I am taking some time off before I start my job as a kindergarten teacher.
Wow, congrats on graduating! That's a huge accomplishment.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
What are you looking forward to most about your new job?
I'm looking forward to meeting my students and helping them learn. I also love working with kids.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love taking care of animals, reading, and listening to music.
Me too! I love animals, especially cats. What kind of animals do you like to take care of?
I love cats too! I have a cat named Mittens. I also love taking care of dogs.
That's great! I used to have a dog, but he passed away a few years ago.
I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's okay. I'm sure I'll get another dog someday.
You should! They're great companions.
I know! I'm looking forward to it.
Good! I'm sure you'll find a great dog.
Thanks!
You're welcome
